articles.title: Protocol Signed between Governments of DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Protocol Signed between Governments of DPRK and Russia
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the 7th meeting of the joint working group for settling the issue related to the implementation of the agreement on temporary work of citizens of other state in the territory of a state between governments of the DPRK and Russia was signed here on Friday.
					 Present at the signing-ceremony from the DPRK side were Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned and from the Russian side members of the delegation of the General Bureau of Emigration Affairs of the Ministry of Interior of the Russian Federation led by Deputy General Director Dmitri Demidenko and Alexandr Minaev, minister-councillor, and other staff members of the Russian Embassy here.
					
					 Ri and Dmitri Demidenko signed the protocol.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Emigration Affairs of the Ministry of Interior of the Russian Federation led by Deputy General Director Dmitri Demidenko visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 The members of the delegation paid floral tribute to the statues.

articles.title: Holding Higher Candlelight Called for: AINDF
articles.content:
Holding Higher Candlelight Called for: AINDF
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) made public a statement titled "Candlelight should be held higher until new politics, new system and new society are brought about where masses have become masters" on Friday, according to internet homepage Kuguk Jonson.
					 The statement said that the candlelight resistance of justice waged by the popular masses which passed a political death sentence on the pro-U.S. conservatives forces, Park Geun Hye and her accomplices and yes-men, was an admirable event that opened a new horizon for independence, democracy and reunification to be remembered and praised long.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 New politics, new system and new society where the popular masses have become masters so much desired by them do not come of their own accord although traitor Park is removed from Chongwadae. 
					
					 The broad segments of people have to turn out in the mass actions to finally eliminate the dregs of history and nation with the same spirit and enthusiasm with which they punished Park.
					
					 As an immediate task, a strong action should be waged to bring to light Park's crimes, immediately put her in custody and force her to stand justice and face stern punishment.
					
					 Dynamic action should be waged to get all the fascist laws for the revival of "yusin" dictatorship sought by the Park regime and all other unpopular laws repealed, to nullify hideous policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen, traitorous treaties and agreements and to get all the evils of the pro-U.S. conservative forces abolished.
					
					 All the people should hold higher the torch of all-people resistance and strive to punish the group of conservatives making last-ditch efforts and bring about a new society, peaceful, prosperous and reunified, free from dictatorship and corruption and irregularities.

articles.title: Resolution Meetings Held across Country
articles.content:
Resolution Meetings Held across Country
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held at institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms and universities across the country in response to the call made by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province to the working people across the country.
					 At the meetings, the appeal was read out before speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed their determination to kindle the flame of creating the Mallima speed at the sites of building an economic power and a highly civilized power under the uplifted banner of the self-development-first principle by holding fast to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and party policies as the lifeline and to steadily produce legendary stories about heroes startling the world and build monuments in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 They called for achieving victories by dint of self-reliance and self-development at the sites of building a powerful socialist country with the same fighting spirit with which those created the spirit of Kangwon Province true to the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and thus, honorably entering the venue of the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners with gift of loyalty and report of victory presented to the party.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 16 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 16 Published
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 16 was published in the DPRK. The book, a cycle of the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, systematically and comprehensively records the works of leader Kim Jong Il in a chronological order.
					 It carries 80 works including talks, speeches and concluding speeches made by Kim Jong Il from August to December Juche 60 (1971).
					
					 The works deal with the fact that Kim Jong Il led the work to celebrate the 60th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest holiday of the nation and strengthened the party work and saw to it that miracles and innovations were brought about in all the fields of socialist cultural construction.
					
					 There are works stressing the need to scientifically formulate the revolutionary idea of the President and intensify the dissemination of the Juche idea among foreign countries. They indicate the problems for improving the party work to suit the characteristics of people.
					
					 Some of the works highlight the importance of arousing creators and artistes in the field of literature and art to implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on literature and art and directing efforts to the work with the people from all walks of life to further consolidate the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 The book also contains the works indicating tasks for creating literary pieces depicting the leader and improving the edition and publication as required by the Party's monolithic ideological system.
					
					 Some works give answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in the revolution and construction such as conducting information service to meet the characteristics of the railway transport field and fully implementing the Party's policy on making sports mass-based and part of one's daily life and developing magic art and acrobatics in a diverse way.

articles.title: Sinchon Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Sinchon Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Sinchon Museum has been visited by a large number of people, their hearts burning with the resolution to punish the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.
					 For the first 10-odd days in March, more than 18,000 service personnel, working people and youths and students visited the museum.
					
					 The museum houses photos and evidence proving the barbarity and cruelty of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies who killed more than 35,000 innocent people in cold blood after invading Sinchon in the period of the strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The visitors were briefed on the monstrous crimes committed by the enemies in human skin.
					
					 At a meeting to vow to take revenge on enemies that was held after the visit, the service personnel pledged to wipe out to the last one the enemies who are going reckless to disturb the happy life of the Korean people even at this moment.

articles.title: National Classic Published
articles.content:
National Classic Published
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University recently translated and published the national classic Jungbomunhonbigo.
					 The classic contains detailed information about various fields including politics, economy, culture and military affairs of Korea from ancient times to modern times.
					
					 It took the university 15 years to translate its 250 volumes and finally it edited and published the classic.
					
					 The translated classic has 21 volumes.

articles.title: Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in DPRK
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in the DPRK channels big efforts into technical development to make new products representing the cosmetics industry of the country.
					 In recent years, the factory began home-production of additives including pigment. And over 20 kinds of trial products successfully passed through clinical examinations.
					
					 The factory, in particular, laid a sci-tech foundation for developing the cosmetics industry by establishing a Korean-style system of classifying cosmetics and methods of examining them.
					
					 To keep the global trend of cosmetics development, it set it as a goal to produce natural and functional cosmetics as required by people.
					
					 The factory also worked out the business strategy based on science and technology and has pushed ahead with further increasing the proportion of locally available raw materials.
					
					 When visiting the factory in February Juche 104 (2015), respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un called for exerting every effort to produce cosmetics with world competitive edge.

articles.title: Spring Campaign for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Campaign for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, the period from March to May is set as the period of general mobilization for land management.
					 According to an official concerned, the main stress has been directed to creating and conserving forests in this year's campaign.
					
					 Tree-planting is being carried out on the principle of mixing coniferous trees with broad-leaved trees and in a scientific way across the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, big efforts have been paid to preventing forest fire.
					
					 The Ogasan Nature Reserve Management Station and other forestry management stations installed modern monitoring devices to take due measures against forest fire. And they have also paid deep attention to protecting forests against harmful insects by means of trichogramme evanescena.
					
					 Positive measures have also been taken one after another to lengthen the serviceable life of timber and decrease dependence on forests.
					
					 The railway transport sector developed an antiseptic technology for sleepers, thus making it possible to extend the serviceable life of wooden structures.
					
					 And measures for reducing wood consumption have been worked out in the fields of construction and building materials, coal-mining, chemical and agricultural industries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Toeing U.S. Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Toeing U.S. Policy
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group are rapidly pressing ahead with their moves for deploying THAAD in collusion with the U.S. despite strong public opposition and denunciation at home and abroad.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The above-said moves are acts of offering the whole of south Korea to the U.S. as the latter's nuclear war outpost, utterly indifferent to the nation's security and interests. 
					
					 Whenever they faced a crisis, they more desperately kicked up rackets for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in collusion with their American master. This is their inveterate disposition and deep-rooted bad habit.
					
					 Their stepped-up moves for the deployment of THAAD are aimed at currying favor with their master by zealously following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and prolonging their remaining days by getting rid of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 The madcap saber-rattling the group of traitors are staging to start a war against the north, together with outside forces, while going busy with the deployment of THAAD would only embolden the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense both in quality and quantity. The war scenario of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers would only precipitate their miserable end.
					
					 It is the demand of all south Koreans that the group of traitors should be thrown overboard as early as possible as they are working hard to inflict a nuclear war disaster upon the nation after depriving them of their cradle for meeting demand of outside forces.
					
					 With neither sophism nor gimmick can the puppet forces cover up their sycophantic and treacherous nature.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands Park Geun Hye Group as Dregs of History
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands Park Geun Hye Group as Dregs of History
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Chief of the Security Office of Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin and Defense Minister Han Min Gu of south Korea are persistently pushing forward the deployment of THAAD, crying out for "strong counteraction against the north's provocation" and soliciting the U.S. master to "strengthen the joint defence posture and extended deterrence" for coping with the "north's nuclear and missile threats." 
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se and Unification Minister Hong Yong Phyo are imploring cooperation in putting pressure on the DPRK and inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen, trumpeting about "the north's nuclear and missile threats," "human rights" and "adherence to principle and consistency" and "focus of efforts on sanctions on the north."
					
					 Commenting on their desperate moves, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 The puppet group is making last-ditch efforts to keep afloat traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation. They are dregs of history, a group of traitors that should be thrown overboard together with Park as early as possible.
					
					 The reckless campaign of the top class yes men of Park is a blatant challenge to the mindset of the south Korean people demanding the   scrapping of her confrontation policy, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet regime's above-said hysteric campaign is an unpardonable act of holding in check the improvement of the north-south relations at any cost, disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of war to this land.
					
					 Lurking behind the said campaign is a cynical ploy to justify the crimes they committed against the nation together with Park Geun Hye and realize the stay of the conservative group in power through its success in the upcoming "presidential election".
					
					 Those human scum and fools, who had played the role of marionette of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil, are shamelessly letting out a litany of rhetoric, not aware of where they stand and others' accusations. This is another tragicomedy that provokes side-splitting laughter among the world people.

articles.title: Papers Mark Anniversary of DPRK- Russia Agreement
articles.content:
Papers Mark Anniversary of DPRK- Russia Agreement
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading newspapers Friday observe the 68th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the conclusion of the agreement between the DPRK and the Soviet Union on March 17, 1949 was the first of its kind concluded between the DPRK and Russia to provide a legal base for developing the mutually beneficial cooperation and exchange.
					
					 Since the historic day the two countries have steadily developed the cooperation and exchange in various fields including the economy and culture and deepened the bonds of friendship for the last 68 years, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 In the 21st century several meetings were held between leader Kim Jong Il and President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin and historic joint documents were adopted in that course. As a result, a new prospect was opened for carrying forward the long-standing tradition for cooperation and further developing it.
					
					 Visits and contacts have been brisk at various levels and views on the issue of the bilateral relations and on international issues have been widely exchanged.
					
					 The DPRK and Russia are the neighbors sharing the same border and their friendly relations are long-standing and traditional. To value and develop the bilateral friendly ties in the desire of the two peoples and the spirit of joint documents agreed upon between both sides is beneficial for ensuring development and stability of the two countries and peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Minju Joson also stresses that only when the DPRK and Russia value the tradition of the friendly relations, support and steadily cooperate with each other and consolidate the friendly relations, will they achieve great successes in their struggle for building powerful countries and in the work for ensuring peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Ending Submission to U.S. and Normalizing South-North Relations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ending Submission to U.S. and Normalizing South-North Relations Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration reportedly issued a statement on March 14, calling for an end to the puppet regime's policy of sycophancy toward the U.S. and the improved south-north relations.
					 The regime's act of pressing for THAAD deployment increased the danger of war, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Park Geun Hye denied the transfer of OPECON and agreed on rotation deployment of the U.S. forces in south Korea, thus making U.S. forces and their latest weapons in the Pacific and the U.S. mainland find their way to south Korea en masse. This has made it possible for the U.S. forces to intervene in Korea in "contingency" on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Park also, yielding to the U.S. demand, reached an "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, a stumbling block in pressing for the agreement on protection of military intelligence with Japan, and agreed on the measure for the Japan "Self-defence Forces' advance into the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Park regime has increased its dependence on the U.S. on the strength of the most shackling south Korea-U.S. "mutual defence treaty" concluded in 1953.
					
					 By taking the advantage of the U.S. "strategic patience" policy, Park held joint military drills with the U.S. every year, not only bringing the south-north relations to a collapse but also further straining the situation in Northeast Asia.
					
					 In order to put an end to submission to the U.S. and normalize the south-north relations it is necessary for the political camp as well as civic and social organizations to make south Korea get rid of the military treaty and work hard to ensure that the issue of the peninsula is settled by the concerted efforts of Koreans, the statement held.

articles.title: No-THAAD, No-War Drills Campaign Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
No-THAAD, No-War Drills Campaign Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action of Civic and Social Organizations for Opposing THAAD Deployment and U.S.-South Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Joint Military Drills launched a sit-in strike on March 13 in Seoul to protest against the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and north-targeted nuclear war drills.
					 The participants in the strike demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean regime stop the war drills escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula and the deployment of THAAD stoking conflict and military tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Although Park Geun Hye was impeached but the conservative forces are persisting in anti-north, anti-communist and anti-peace policies in a bid to maintain their power, they charged.
					
					 That day there were a rally and a demonstration in protest against the war drills and deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Korea: KCTU Declares Action for Election
articles.content:
S. Korea: KCTU Declares Action for Election
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday to declare the "2017 Action of KCTU for 'Presidential' Election".
					 Choe Jong Jin, acting chairman of the KCTU, stated that the organization decided the "presidential" election to be held on May 9 as an opportunity to achieve great changes in society.
					
					 Meanwhile, the KCTU made public on the same day five-point items and 10-point demands including system abolition, withdrawal of part-time jobs and improvement of employment conditions as well as the demands and main programs of affiliated trade unions.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China was formed on March 1 to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly hold celebration events including a meeting, photo and book exhibition, film show and art performance in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed in Prague on Mar. 7.
					 Josef Servista, deputy general secretary of the C.C., Czechoslovak Communist Party and vice-chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Mar. 7 to April 20 and decided to organize remembrance meeting, seminar, film show and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises Slammed Abroad
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises Slammed Abroad
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Austria and the Czech Republic on Mar. 9 made public statements in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean forces' reckless war exercises aimed at preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK.
					 The Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Vienna of Austria said in its statement that the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are a dangerous saber-rattling leading the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 The DPRK had already declared that it would continue to build up the self-defence capability, the pivot of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for preemptive attack as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threat and blackmail and they do not stop their war games staged under the veil of "annual".
					
					 The U.S. should come out to conclude a peace accord with the DPRK, mindful that the latter is a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association in its statement condemned the joint military exercises as a military provocation for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and a grave challenge wrecking the regional peace and security.
					
					 The world progressives should not pardon the moves of aggression by the U.S. and its vassal forces, it said.

articles.title: Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Urged
articles.content:
Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Urged
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A British organization and a Belarusian personage issued statements on Mar. 4 and 5 to protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Staffordshire branch of the Korean Friendship Association UK in its statement exposed the danger of large-scale war games being staged by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK has already put forward substantial proposals to ensure the peace on the Korean peninsula several times.
					
					 If the present U.S. administration has the intent to pursue a prudent diplomatic policy, it should halt the war games being waged on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity and opt for opening dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 We call on the progressive peoples to strongly demand a stop to the joint military exercises for aggression in order to ensure the global peace and security.
					
					 We also appeal to them to oppose war and extend support and solidarity to the cause of the Korean people for national reunification.
					
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Workers' Party of Belarus who is chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, said in his statement:
					
					 The situation prevailing on the peninsula shows that the U.S. and its vassal forces seek to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is staging dangerous war games that can spill over into the world.
					
					 The international community should urge the U.S. to ink a peace accord with the DPRK and withdraw its forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Firmado protocolo de VII reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo entre la RPDC y la FR
articles.content:
Firmado protocolo de VII reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo entre la RPDC y la FR
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 17 en esta capital el protocolo de la VII reunion del grupo conjunto de trabajo entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Federacion Rusa para resolver el problema referente a la ejecucion del convenio sobre las actividades laborales provisionales de los ciudadanos de un Estado en el territorio del otro.
					En la ceremonia de firmas participaron el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun, y otros funcionarios por la parte coreana y por la rusa, la delegacion del Buro General de Asuntos de Emigracion del Ministerio del Interior, encabezada por el subdirector general, Dmitri Demidenko, y el ministro consejero Alexandr Minaev y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en la RPDC.
					
					Ri Kwang Gun y Dmitri Demidenko firmaron el documento.

articles.title: Portavoz del CC de FDNA exhorta a la lucha con velas por crear nueva sociedad
articles.content:
Portavoz del CC de FDNA exhorta a la lucha con velas por crear nueva sociedad
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun la pagina Web "Frente de Salvacion Nacional", el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA) hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion intitulada "Hay que intensificar la lucha con velas hasta que se logren nueva politica, nuevo regimen y nueva sociedad donde el pueblo juegue el papel protagonico".
					El documento adelanta que la justa resistencia con velas del pueblo, que condeno a la muerte politica a Park Geun-hye y las fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis, colectivo de sus complices y corruptos, estara siempre presente en la memoria de todos siendo elogiada como evento bravo que abrio el nuevo horizonte para la independencia, la democracia y la unificacion.
					
					Aunque la traidora Park fue expulsada de Chongwadae, la nueva politica, nuevo regimen y nueva sociedad donde el pueblo desempene el papel protagonico, deseados unanimemente por el, no se logran nunca de manera espontanea, apunta y prosigue:
					
					Todos los habitantes de distintos estratos deben movilizarse en la lucha masiva por enterrar una vez por todas a las basuras de la historia y la nacion con aquel impetu y pasion con que castigaron duro a Park Geun-hye.
					
					Por inmediato, tienen que seguir revelando y condenando los crimenes y dinamizar la lucha por encarcelar de inmediato a Park y dictarle el castigo severo en el tribunal.
					
					Ademas, deben luchar energicamente por invalidar las leyes fascistas y antipopulares de toda indole encaminadas a resucitar la dictadura de Yusin (renovacion), las brutales politicas fratricidas, los pactos y convenios vendepatrias, que persiguio y fabrico el "poder" de Park, y liquidar todas las consecuencias de las fechorias de las fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis.
					
					Todos los habitantes deben luchar con el coraje redoblado por construir la nueva sociedad pacifica, unificada y prospera donde el pueblo sea el dueno y no haya las fuerzas extranjeras, ni la dictadura ni los actos de corrupcion e injusticia.
					
					Para ese fin, tienen que movilizarse generalmente en la resistencia de todo el pueblo para castigar a la banda conservadora proyanqui que esta desesperada para salir de la crisis.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a lacayos de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a lacayos de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin y el ministro de Defensa Nacional Han Min Gu solicitaron a sus amos norteamericanos a "intensificar la disposicion de defensa conjunta y el disuasivo ampliado frente a la amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte", hablando de la "provocacion del Norte" y de la "reaccion fuerte", e impulsan de continuo el emplazamiento de "THAAD".
					Por otra parte, el canciller Yun Pyong Se y el ministro de Unificacion Hong Yong Phyo demandan la cooperacion en la presion anti-RPDC e inculcan la confrontacion fratricida hablando de la "amenaza nuclear y de misil" y los "derechos humanos" de alguien, el "mantenimiento de principios y constancia" y la "concentracion de la sancion sobre el Norte".
					
					El periodico Minju Joson divulgo el dia 17 un comentario individual calificando a aquellos de escorias humanas y basuras de la historia a ser enterradas cuanto antes junto con la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					
					Las imprudentes locuras conflictivas de los lacayos fieles a Park Geun-hye desafian a los habitantes surcoreanos que demandan la abolicion de la politica conflictiva de Park, insiste el periodico y prosigue:
					
					Las maniobras desesperadas de la banda titere surcoreana tendentes a mantener la politica de confrontacion de la traidora Park devienen la imperdonable traicion para impedir a toda costa la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, violar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y traer a este territorio la peligrosidad de guerra.
					
					Las tentativas de los conservadores surcoreanos demuestran claramente la mala intencion de racionalizar sus crimenes cometidos ante la nacion y retomar el poder en las proximas "elecciones presidenciales".
					
					Todo el mundo no presta oidos a las tonterias de los lacayos de Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza la actitud proyanqui de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza la actitud proyanqui de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Pese al fuerte rechazo de los nacionales y extranjeros, los titeres surcoreanos dan acicate al emplazamiento de THAAD en confabulacion con EE.UU. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual de este viernes, lo califica de crimen antinacional para entregar el suelo surcoreano como base avanzada de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. sin tomar en consideracion la seguridad ni los intereses de la nacion, y continua:
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos tienen el vicio de intensificar la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida en colaboracion con su amo norteamericano, cada vez que caen en la crisis. 
					
					Ellos intentan emplazar el sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD con el objetivo de congraciarse con su patron gringo al sumarse a su politica de hostilidad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y mantener su precaria vida politica. 
					
					Pero, sus alborotos belicos contra la parte connacional en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras no traeran otro resultado que el fortalecimiento cualitativo y cuantitativo del disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC y aceleraran el arruinamiento tragico de si mismos. 
					
					La poblacion surcoreana insiste unanimemente en eliminar lo mas pronto posible a la camarilla traidora que para cumplir las exigencias gangsteriles de las fuerzas extranjeras, hace cualquier cosa como arrebatarle la cuna de vida e imponerle los desastres de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no pueden ocultar de ninguna manera su naturaleza proyanqui y antinacional.
